titleInfo.title: Bluegrass Show featuring Joe Stuart, Carl Sauceman, and more at Old Fireman's Hall (18283)

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
mods.abstract: Two color window card (black and red on brown) announcing a Bluegrass Show featuring Joe Stuart, Carl Sauceman and Green Valley Boys, Luke Thompson, Monroe Fields, Dennie Blount, Fred Richardson, Teresa Black, Fiddlin' Joe Salard, The Green Valley Cutups, Mike Franz, and more at Old Fireman's Hall on November 30. Poster features metal photoplates of Joe Stuart and Carl Sauceman. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/42791/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
